about_the_game:
Three full cartridges available to play for free, complete with Collectables, Achievements & Cheats

Horror Cartridge Collection is a series of short form horror games in the PSX style, with each game (Cartridge) offering a unique experience with different gameplay mechanics, styles and stories all connected by the mall.

Key Features

  • In-game Achievements
  • Collectables
  • Multiple Endings
  • Adjustable Retro Settings
  • Developer Commentary
  • Cheats

The Found Cartridges


Out Of Gas
Your car has just run out of gas in the middle of nowhere. A sign tells you a gas station is only two miles up the road. Make your way to it on foot.
  • Playtime - 7 Minutes
  • Endings - 7
  • Collectables - 1
  • First-person - Walking - Dialogue

Nightmare
You are a young child who has woken up in the middle of the night after hearing a sound coming from downstairs. Investigate the sound and remember, don't panic.
  • Playtime - 15 Minutes
  • Endings - 2
  • Collectables - 1
  • First-person - Cartoony - Lucid - Monsters

The Mine
The sun has set, it's time to descend into the mine in search of riches. Take your trusty pickaxe and lantern in the exploration for ore and other treasures.
  • Playtime - 30 Minutes
  • Endings - 4
  • Collectables - 2
  • First-person - Mining - Combat - Zombies

Save games will be carried over to the full version without issue.

name: Horror Cartridge Collection Freeware Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A collection of retro styled games bundled together, experience many forms of horror in a wide array of styles whilst uncovering the mysteries of the old mall that holds them all. Play Out of gas, Nightmare & The Mine for free!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
